scripts.test: cross-env DATABASE_PATH=test-lucidcoder.db vitest run --config vitest.unit.config.js && cross-env DATABASE_PATH=test-lucidcoder.db vitest run --config vitest.parallel.config.js && cross-env DATABASE_PATH=test-lucidcoder.db vitest run --config vitest.integration.config.js
scripts.test:coverage: cross-env DATABASE_PATH=test-lucidcoder.db vitest run --config vitest.unit.config.js --coverage --coverage.reporter=json --coverage.reportsDirectory=coverage-tmp/unit && cross-env DATABASE_PATH=test-lucidcoder.db VITEST_COVERAGE=1 VITEST_MAX_WORKERS=1 vitest run --config vitest.parallel.config.js --coverage --coverage.reporter=json --coverage.reportsDirectory=coverage-tmp/parallel && cross-env DATABASE_PATH=test-lucidcoder.db VITEST_COVERAGE=1 VITEST_MAX_WORKERS=1 vitest run --config vitest.integration.config.js --coverage --coverage.reporter=json --coverage.reportsDirectory=coverage-tmp/integration && node scripts/merge-coverage.mjs coverage-tmp/unit coverage-tmp/parallel coverage-tmp/integration
scripts.coverage:db: cross-env DATABASE_PATH=test-lucidcoder.db nyc --reporter=none vitest run tests/database.test.js --coverage --coverage.include=backend/database.js
